<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>create</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Weather Transformation">d146053647a22110f35e7ac8f36d43cc</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {

	// Add your code here
	var celsius  = parseInt(source)-273.15; 
	return celsius.toString(); // return the value to be put into the target field
	
	

})(source);]]></source_script><source_table>x_141565_helloworl_staging_weather_data</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-05-09 09:51:04</sys_created_on><sys_id>e81385c847722110ac0f750cd36d43f0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="HelloWorld" source="x_141565_helloworl">a370559b47a42110f35e7ac8f36d434c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="HelloWorld">a370559b47a42110f35e7ac8f36d434c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_e81385c847722110ac0f750cd36d43f0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-05-09 10:33:58</sys_updated_on><target_field>temperature</target_field><target_table>x_141565_helloworl_weather</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>
